successes.title: Pegasus Touch Laser SLA 3D Printer: Low cost, High Quality
successes.description: Touchscreen LCD desktop 3D printer starting <$2k using LASER based tech for high speed prints, 7"x7"x9" build area, and detail.

Pledges.description: Support the next generation of affordable, easy to use, fast and high quality, desktop 3D Printers.  Get a special mention as a supporter on the FSL3D website and a subscription to our newsletter.

3D Printed Mini Rook.  See the high quality output from the Pegasus Touch printer in person with a 3D printed mini rook similar to the one in the video (@22sec).  Even at only 29mm (1.14") tall, see all the impressive detail steps in the spiral staircase and double helix structure.  Shipping within the US included.  International shipping extra.

1 liter of high quality resin.  Currently available in yellow, green and red; other colors coming soon.  Shipping paid separately (arrange your own shipping or pickup from our Las Vegas office for free).

4 liters of high quality resin.  Buy in bulk and save!  Currently available in yellow, green and red; other colors coming soon.  Shipping paid separately (arrange your own shipping or pickup from our Las Vegas office for free).

Level 1 Printer Reward.  Patience pays off.  Receive the lowest price on a Pegasus Touch SLA 3D printer after all other Kickstarter rewards are shipped but before any other non Kickstarter orders.  Printer is fully assembled and calibrated.  Includes 500ml of starter resin.  Shipping paid separately (arrange your own shipping or pickup from our Las Vegas office for free).  US only.

Level 2 Printer Reward.  Patience pays off.  Receive a great price on a Pegasus Touch SLA 3D printer.  Ships before Level 1 but after Level 3 Kickstarter rewards.  Printer is fully assembled and calibrated.  Includes 500ml of starter resin.  Shipping paid separately (arrange your own shipping or pickup from our Las Vegas office for free). US and International ok.

Level 3 Printer Reward.  Receive a great price on a Pegasus Touch SLA 3D printer.  Ships after Level 4 Kickstarter Rewards.  Printer is fully assembled and calibrated.  Includes 500ml of starter resin.  Shipping paid separately (arrange your own shipping or pickup from our Las Vegas office for free). US and International ok.

Early Bird Level 5 Limited.  Receive a great price on a Pegasus Touch SLA 3D printer AND get it quickly!  Limited production number ships early.  Ships after Level 6 Kickstarter Rewards.  Printer is fully assembled and calibrated.  Includes 500ml of starter resin.  Shipping paid separately (arrange your own shipping or pickup from our Las Vegas office for free). US only.

Level 4 Printer Reward.  Receive a great price on a Pegasus Touch SLA 3D printer.  Ships after Level 5 Kickstarter Rewards.  Printer is fully assembled and calibrated.  Includes 500ml of starter resin.  Shipping paid separately (arrange your own shipping or pickup from our Las Vegas office for free). US and International ok.

Level 4 Printer Reward.  Receive a great price on a Pegasus Touch SLA 3D printer.  Ships after Level 5 Kickstarter Rewards.  Printer is fully assembled and calibrated.  Includes 500ml of starter resin.  Shipping paid separately (arrange your own shipping or pickup from our Las Vegas office for free). US and International ok.

Shipments at $2500 reward level will ship at the same time - we could not change estimated delivery (originally quoted as July now shortened to May 2014 for level 4) after pledges started so need to create a new level.

Level 6: 3D Printer + 5th Gen Laser Cutter.  Personal Fabrication dream set.  Receive one of our famous 5th Gen hobby lasers and be amongst the first to receive a Pegasus Touch 3D Printer with 500ml of starter resin.  Free 1.5” lens and air compressor for laser.  Ships after Level 7 (laser can ship immediately).  Shipping paid separately (arrange your own shipping or pickup from our Las Vegas office for free).  US and International ok.
